Technical details:DVD, widescreen (1.78:1, enhanced); Dolby Digital 5.1 surround.

Language:English, dubbed French, dubbed Spanish or dubbed Portuguese dialogue, optional French, Portuguese or Spanish subtitles; English subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing.

Performer:Narrator, James Earl Jones.

Credits:Editor, Martin Elsbury ; composer, George Fenton ; music, Berliner Philharmoniker ; producers, Alix Tidmarsh & Sophokles Tasioulis ; writers, Leslie Megahey, Alastair Fothergill, Mark Linfield ; directors, Alastair Fothergill and Mark Linfield.

Audience:MPAA rating: G.

Summary:A story of three animal families on a journey across our planet - polar bears, elephants, and humpback whales. It captures rare footage of nature's wildest and most elusive animals.

General Note:Special features: "Earth diaries:" the making of Earth the movie.
